25d46780-1e35-4ad1-a5a5-593569ab3a12.description: Earner has a foundational understanding of Blockchain, types, applications, scope, limitations, synergies. Understands the basic mechanisms of decentralisation, cryptography & consensus that helps create & secure it. Has done domain specific use case analysis. Understands Blockchain application design, functionalities & the underlying technology. Is aware of bitcoin design, smart contracts, consensus algorithms, tokenization, oracles, DApps, DAOs, crypto risks & investments, Cardano Protocol.
25d46780-1e35-4ad1-a5a5-593569ab3a12.name: EMURGO Certified: Foundations of Blockchain with Overview of Cardano

badge_template_activities.title: Earner must be interested in learning Blockchain, its application and usecases.

Complete 42 hours of instructor-led training program on the origin, use cases and terminology of Blockchain technology, including fundamental concepts. The program aims to incubate awareness of Blockchain for an individual who is interested in understanding blockchain, its application and use cases and create necessary base for understand how blockchain works.
Course Description

9ed909af-c4d3-4be1-b878-326591838157.description: Earner has a foundational understanding of Blockchain, its applications, scope, limitations & synergies. Understands the basic mechanisms of decentralisation, cryptography & consensus that helps create & secure it. Has done domain specific use case analysis, broadly understands Blockchain application design & is aware of consensus algorithms, smart contracts, tokenization, oracles, DApps, DAOs & has a novice understanding of smart contract development on Ethereum using Solidity & Remix IDE.
9ed909af-c4d3-4be1-b878-326591838157.name: IGNITIVE Labs - Completed Foundations of Blockchain Program

badge_template_activities.title: Earner must be a college student pursuing their bachelor's degree

Complete 45 hours of instructor-led training program on the origin, use cases and terminology of Blockchain technology, including fundamental concepts and the Ethereum blockchain. The program aims to incubate awareness of Blockchain within the college campus and create necessary Blockchain skills to bridge the gap in demand for quality Blockchain Developers.
Final online assessment conducted at the end of the program.
Course Details

51b3ce96-1a6e-40e5-9244-78bb680c4fa3.description: The earner has gained a fundamental understanding of Cardano as a blockchain protocol, with a good understanding of its internals. Has spent extensive time becoming comfortable with functional programming and the associated mindset through the development of Haskell-based applications. Has gained a good overview of Financial contract development using Marlowe, a Domain Specific Language built for the Financial world. Has created a specific mini-project utilizing Haskell.
51b3ce96-1a6e-40e5-9244-78bb680c4fa3.name: EMURGO Certified Cardano Developer Associate

badge_template_activities.title: The Earner must possess proficiency in any one programming language. Should have completed the EMURGO “Foundations of Blockchain” program or the "Design and Architecture of Blockchain" module successfully.

A 75-hour program designed to introduce the learner to the various concepts required to become a proficient Cardano Application Developer. The emphasis is on understanding the basics of Cardano blockchain protocol engineering, as well as functional programming through the lens of Haskell, Right from the design to the development of a Haskell-based application. The learner gains a good overview of Financial contract development using Marlowe, a Domain Specific Language for the Financial world.
The learner must have successfully completed 33 internal assessments.
During the course of this program, Earner has spent at least 75 hours of theory and hands-on coding experience and developed a project using the Haskell programming language,

skills.name: Cardano Protocol Low Level Understanding Of Mechanisms
Explain The Basics Of Functional Programming.

a5febdd9-439e-43a8-becd-5dde49d43a54.description: Earner has gained a fundamental understanding of Ethereum as a development protocol, become proficient in development of smart contracts in the Solidity language. Is comfortable with rapid prototyping of smart contract code using the Remix Online IDE, deployment, interaction with the smart contract using the user interface presented by Remix. Has achieved proficiency in understanding token standards ERC20 and ERC721. Has created a domain specific mini-project using smart contracts and tokens.
a5febdd9-439e-43a8-becd-5dde49d43a54.name: EMURGO Certified Ethereum Developer Associate

badge_template_activities.title: The Earner must possess prior basic programming experience. Should have completed the EMURGO “Foundations of Blockchain” program successfully.
Should have completed the 30 hours of Practitioner led experiential learning comprising of theory and hands on.
Should have successfully completed 11 internal assessments,
Should have individually developed and submitted a functional smart contract based project.

87a12666-6a48-475c-bde3-1ee937a3712c.description: Gained an understanding of Cardano development features: EUTXO architecture, Native assets, scripts,Plutus script development along with an understanding of related Cardano Improvement Proposals. Setting up the Cardano development environment, look at the structure of addresses, encoding formats, transaction structure, transaction metadata, native tokens, minting and burning tokens as well as the utilization of third-party services and frameworks like Blockfrost, CardanoCLI-JS, DandelionJS APIs.
87a12666-6a48-475c-bde3-1ee937a3712c.name: EMURGO Certified Cardano Developer Professional

badge_template_activities.title: The Earner must be an Emurgo Certified Cardano Developer Associate (60+ Hours). Should have proficiency in Foundations of Blockchain, Cardano Overview, and Haskell before joining the program.

The Earner must have attended 60 hours of Online Live Training, with a balanced mix of theory and hands-on coding experience. Understands the toolchain, native, and Plutus based development approaches with exposure to a rich set of samples highlighting various aspects of the protocol.
The Earner must have completed 2 sub-module assessments (Native Aspects, Plutus Aspects).

To demonstrate the understanding and skills in building Native / Plutus-based applications, the Earner should have developed a Plutus contract based Project utilizing Haskell & Plutus. The Earner should have developed either a native aspect project using native tokens, preferably using Blockfrost and other third-party frameworks, or a Plutus contract based Project utilizing Haskell & Plutus.

skills.name: Cardano Protocol Low Level Understanding Of Mechanisms
Explain The Basics Of Functional Programming.

a8b2cf71-ff17-4ba6-965f-aa6780718c1d.description: Earner is a proficient Blockchain Developer, cognizant of its advantages & aware of industry use cases. Understands the technology, its implications. Is able to design Blockchain based decentralized applications (public & enterprise), is skilled at Ethereum, Hyperledger Fabric & Cardano, has functional understanding of security issues, mitigation strategies, proficient in life cycle development of Blockchain solutions, unit testing & static security analysis of smart contracts & DApp Design.
a8b2cf71-ff17-4ba6-965f-aa6780718c1d.name: EMURGO Certified Full Stack Blockchain Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Earner must be a working professional with programming skills with 2 to 15 years of work experience in their field.

Complete a flexible comprehensive 183 hours of Blockchain training program through blended learning mode for IT professionals with prior programming skills. This program has four levels. Level 1 - Foundations of Blockchain (28 hours), Level 2 - Ethereum (61 hours), Level 3 - Hyperledger Fabric (59 hours), Level 4 - Cardano (35 hours).
Complete 62 assessments. 23 at Level 1 - Foundations, 25 for Level -2 Ethereum, 6 at Level - 3 Hyperledger and 8 in Level - 4 Cardano.

Complete 3 real-time projects, assigned and mentored by Blockchain  experts at each of the technical levels, i.e. 1 Project on Ethereum (Public Blockchain), 1 on Hyperledger Fabric (Private Blockchain) and 1 in Cardano (3rd Generation Blockchain).
Course Outline

8e028b6a-3e14-46e3-b460-172b74026900.description: The earner has gained a comprehensive grasp on the functional understanding of various domains and related applications, gained a firm design understanding and ability to visualize and create blockchain-based solutions which are synergistic with existing business infrastructure and applications. Has gained an understanding of various components in existing business solutions, as well as an understanding of where blockchain-based components can bring in value.
8e028b6a-3e14-46e3-b460-172b74026900.name: EMURGO Academy Certified - Blockchain Business Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: The Participant should have completed the EMURGO “Foundations of Blockchain” program successfully.

Must Complete the 40-hour Instructor Led Experiential program, as well as at least 20 to 30 hours in the creation and submission of the final blockchain-based project analysis for a particular domain.
Must submit a Final Project Work and qualify.

5e129336-4792-4066-ace3-86c76271d2da.description: Earner has gained a strong understanding of Ethereum as a development protocol, proficient in development of DApps with smart contracts in the Solidity. Comfortable with the complete lifecycle development of smart contract based Applications right from Use case and Requirement Analysis, to smart contract design, development of front end interfaces ,Unit Testing , Security Analysis using Static Analysis Tools, deployment on to various networks. Expertise in token standards like ERC20 and ERC721.
5e129336-4792-4066-ace3-86c76271d2da.name: EMURGO Certified Ethereum Developer Professional

badge_template_activities.title: The Earner must possess prior basic programming experience. Should have completed the EMURGO “Ethereum Developer Associate” program successfully.
Should have completed the 35 hours of Practitioner led experiential learning comprising of theory and hands on.
Should have successfully completed 15 internal assessments,
Should have Individually developed and submitted a complete functional Decentralized Application (DApp) with a web front-end and smart contract based project.

Should have attended the 35 Hours Course Outlined:  Geth & Setting up an Ethereum node -- Front-end integration using Web3JS -- Truffle & OpenZeppelin Frameworks -- Unit Testing in Solidity  Javascript -- Design Patterns in Blockchain -- Understanding Significant Blockchain Hacks & Mitigations -- Security Design Considerations  -- Security Audits using Static Analysis Tools

8928628a-b241-437b-8c27-4495acbbf942.description: Earner has gained a fundamental understanding of Ethereum as a development protocol, become proficient in development of smart contracts in the Solidity language, learnt the basics of Decentralized App Development with Web3, Truffle. The Earner has also understood the overall design and lifecycle of an Ethereum project right from design requirements to DApp development, tokenization, testing, deployment and security implications and mitigations.
8928628a-b241-437b-8c27-4495acbbf942.name: IGNITIVE Labs - Ethereum Developer Bootcamp

badge_template_activities.title: The Participant must be a college student pursuing Bachelor’s Degree, and possess prior programming experience. Should have completed the EMURGO “Foundations of Blockchain” program successfully.

Must Complete the 35 hour Instructor Led Experiential program, designed to introduce to the various facets of Ethereum Decentralized Application Development. The emphasis is on understanding the entire lifecycle of an Ethereum project right from design to testing and deployment, with a balanced mix of theory and hands-on.
Must qualify the Final Assessment conducted.
Individually or as a Team, must successfully complete a Project Work on Ethereum Platform. Should create and present a functional DApp.

a96ec2ab-12ce-4aca-acb7-610f08fd9498.description: Earner is a proficient Blockchain Developer, cognizant of its advantages & aware of industry use cases. Understands the technology, its implications. Is able to design Blockchain-based decentralized applications (public), is skilled at Ethereum, has functional understanding of security issues, mitigation strategies, proficient in life cycle development of Blockchain solutions, unit testing & static security analysis of smart contracts & DApp Design.
a96ec2ab-12ce-4aca-acb7-610f08fd9498.name: EMURGO Certified Ethereum Blockchain Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Earner must be a working professional with programming skills with 2 to 15 years of work experience in their field.
Should have completed a flexible comprehensive, 61 hours of Blockchain training program through blended learning mode for IT professionals with prior programming skills.
Completed successfully 25 Internal Assessments.
Complete 1 real-time project, assigned and mentored by Blockchain experts on Ethereum (Public Blockchain).
Course Outline

8b216182-ac82-4f85-a892-bc7b3ada13b2.description: Earner is a proficient Blockchain Developer, cognizant of its advantages & aware of industry use cases. Understands the technology, its implications. Is able to design Blockchain-based decentralized applications (enterprise), is skilled at Hyperledger Fabric, has functional understanding of security issues, mitigation strategies, proficient in life cycle development of Blockchain solutions, unit testing & is proficient in the development of Chaincode (smart contracts) in the Go language.
8b216182-ac82-4f85-a892-bc7b3ada13b2.name: EMURGO Certified Hyperledger Fabric Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Earner must be a working professional with programming skills with 2 to 15 years of work experience in their field.
